stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Bloodline Runes Uncover Secrets of Aging
stories.fantasy_story: Wizards of the Grand College of Arcane Studies have unveiled secrets within the innate essence of folk. They found that certain bloodline runes grow longer with age, and specific magical signatures can quadruple this expansion. These growing runes are sometimes linked to grave ailments of the body.

stories.original_headline: Common food preservatives linked to higher risk of type 2 diabetes
stories.original_summary: Foods that rely heavily on preservatives may be doing more than extending shelf life. In a large study spanning more than a decade, people with the highest intake of preservative additives were far more likely to develop type 2 diabetes. The increased risk appeared across many commonly used additive
stories.fantasy_headline: Beware the Ever-Fresh Feast: Preserving Potions Linked to Wasting Sickness
stories.fantasy_story: Alchemists have uncovered a troubling truth about enchanted elixirs used to keep food fresh for many moons. A decade-long study revealed that those who consume much of these preserving potions often fall prey to the Wasting Sickness. This risk was found across many common freshness charms.

stories.fantasy_headline: Grand Merchant Guild Plans Colossal Marketplace Near Windy Plains
stories.fantasy_story: The powerful Merchant Guild of the Great River seeks to build an even grander trading emporium. Near the settlements of the Windy Plains, the Elders of the Township Council have approved their proposal. This vast marketplace will span many plots of earth, offering goods from across the realm.
